name: Alin
description:
ALIN DESCRIPTION

Loneliness ...
It's everything that a little soul in the universe could know until a cosmic storm brought him to a mysterious planet where he could take a shape ... Who knows what waits him in the end of this adventure and is he that much alone in this universe...

CONTROLS

Arrows - move

Hold Space - show elements to choose

Arrows while holding space - choose elements

Z - jump

X - shoot fireball

C - use special ability

ELEMENT ABILITIES 

Water - Jump. More water - more heigh

Air - Speed. More air - more speed

Earth - Mass. More earth - more mass

Fire - Fireball. More fire - more fireball distance

SPECIAL ABILITIES

Fire + Water = Steam cloud - You turn into a steam that can pass gates

Fire + Water + Earth = Meteor - you turn into a meteor that flies far

All elements combine = Smash - you can destroy earth

Changelog:

v. 1.1 Fixed critical game bug when player shoots spider. Fixed end of the game.
